name: LDjam41
description:
Please enjoy my take on the Ludum Dare 41 Theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres" I decided to combine platforming with a procedural generated top down maze turned on it's side speed runner! Jump, Double Jump, and Wall Jump your way through ever expanding mazes to CodeChomper find his way out of his digital labyrinth while collecting code bites!

### Controls: arrows or wasd (you can use space to jump too)

Build with Godot!
